name: phenomenal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 extremely successful or special, especially in a surprising way: Her rise to fame was quite phenomenal - in less than two years she was a household name.

unusually great; much more or much better: Angela can do a phenomenal amount of work in one day. He has a phenomenal memory. phenomenally adverb us
